description: These LGBT and same-sex engagement sessions are all about connection—laughing mid-sentence, getting cozy somewhere meaningful, and being completely yourselves in front of the camera. Whether it’s along the Boston waterfront, tucked into the Arnold Arboretum, or somewhere totally unexpected, these sessions reflect each couple’s vibe and story. As a gay wedding and engagement photographer (and fellow queer human), I know how important it is to feel at ease—especially in front of the lens. I’ll guide you just enough so you’re not wondering what to do with your hands, but the focus is always on capturing your dynamic naturally, not posing you like someone you’re not. If you’re planning your session and looking for inspiration—or just want to see how much fun this can be—scroll through these stories of LGBTQ+ couples doing their thing, their way.
name: LGBT Couples Sessions
